channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Markets are finely poised between a bullish breakout and bearish breakdown, says Bank of America strategist.
item.description: This market is poised for a breakout that could swing either in favor of the bulls or the bears, says Bank of America’s Michael Hartnett.

item.title: FLUX.1 Kontext enables in-context image generation for enterprise AI pipelines
item.description: FLUX.1 Kontext from Black Forest Labs aims to let users edit images multiple times through both text and reference images without losing speed.

item.title: Fueling seamless AI at scale
item.description: From large language models (LLMs) to reasoning agents, today’s AI tools bring unprecedented computational demands. Trillion-parameter models, workload...

item.title: ‘The situation is extreme’: I’m 65 and leaving my estate to only one grandchild. Can the others contest my will?
item.description: “I feel it is absolutely necessary to leave about 90% of what I have to just one grandchild.”

item.title: Consumer spending softened as tariffs kicked in. Anxious Americans saved more in April.
item.description: Households boosted spending in March, especially on cars, to avoid tariff-related price increases. They cut back last month as the tariffs started to ...

item.title: The Download: sycophantic LLMs, and the AI Hype Index

item.title: Is Trump’s trade strategy in limbo? Yes, but ‘Tariff Man’ has options.
item.description: Trump’s tariff playbook may be getting rewritten by the courts, but the era of low U.S. tariffs is over.

item.title: Airbnb’s stock is now a sell, as a subdued summer for leisure travel looms, analyst says
item.description: Analysts cut price targets across the U.S. hotel sector as expectations dip on wavering consumer confidence and a drop in inbound international travel...

item.title: This benchmark used Reddit’s AITA to test how much AI models suck up to us

item.title: DeepSeek R1-0528 arrives in powerful open source challenge to OpenAI o3 and Google Gemini 2.5 Pro
item.description: Additionally, the model’s hallucination rate has been reduced, contributing to more reliable and consistent output.

item.title: How Boston Dynamics’ Atlas humanoid adapts to changing environments
item.description: Atlas humanoid demonstrates advanced real-time perception and adaptability in chaotic environments, showcasing AI's evolution in robotic capabilities....

item.title: Emotive voice AI startup Hume launches new EVI 3 model with rapid custom voice creation
item.description: While EVI 3’s specific API pricing has not been announced yet (marked as TBA), the pattern suggests it will be usage-based.

item.title: Encharge AI unveils EN100 AI accelerator chip with analog memory
item.description: EnCharge AI, a startup that raised $144 million to date, announced the EnCharge EN100, an AI accelerator built on analog in-memory computing.

item.title: How Snowflake’s open-source text-to-SQL and Arctic inference models solve enterprise AI’s two biggest deployment headaches
item.description: New open-source efforts from Snowflake aim to help solve that unsolved challenges of text-to-SQL and inference performance for enterprise AI.

item.title: Dexterity partners with Sanmina to scale Mech mobile manipulator
